/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a panoramic view of the city's vibrant life. The street below is a hive of activity, with cars and buses moving along the road, their colors muted against the bright blue sky. The sun shines brightly in the background, casting a warm glow over the scene. The buildings lining the street are tall and modern, their glass facades reflecting the sunlight. The greenery of trees and bushes adds a touch of nature to the urban landscape. The image is bathed in the light of day, highlighting the hustle and bustle of city life in Beijing.
